welcome_message_body: Welcome to Germiston, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore our beautiful surroundings and enjoy all that Germiston has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Grand Central Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pilanesberg Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lanseria Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
